name: PostOffice
description:
PostOffice is a game where you have to manage shipments. You can choose between 3 difficulties. EASY: you can manage shipments calmly and you will already know the cost of shipping. NORMAL: same as EASY but with less time available. HARD: you will have to look for the shipping price through your manual and you will not have time to waste.

Every day the number of shipments will increase, try to advance your rank without making mistakes.
